# Generated by "yarp cmake" & Juan G Victores 2014

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6)

set(KEYWORD "paintSquaresOnScreen")

# Start a project
project(${KEYWORD})


set(CONFIG_PY_DIR ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR})
configure_file(paintSquaresOnScreen.py ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/paintSquaresOnScreen.py @ONLY)

set(CONFIG_PY_DIR ${PYTHON_INSTALL_DIR})
configure_file(paintSquaresOnScreen.py
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/installFiles/paintSquaresOnScreen.py @ONLY)
install(PROGRAMS ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/installFiles/paintSquaresOnScreen.py
  DESTINATION bin)
